name: INSPIRE_Q_Clybourn_18-inch_Toss_Diamond_Impressions_Accent_Pillow_(Set_of_2)
reviews: Colors were dull and drab, thought they would look more white.
Love these pillows, very high quality. They look great on my couch and live seat.
These pillows are not quite as sturdy as I would like. I have had to sew up one of the corners that ripped.
These pillows are durable and attractive. I paired one with a matching slipper chair in the bedroom and tossed one onto the bed--nice.
The product description was really good and I couldn't be more pleased!
These pilows were flatter than expected.
worth their money Matches with my storage bench.
These pillows are soft and well made.
Well made match my sofa so beautifully
i purchased 4 pillows look great on sofa with chairs to match
Loved these throw pillows, came back and ordered the ottomon bench.
Nice padding. Wish fabric was a little softer to the touch
These are very nice pillows and I appreciate the fact that the fabric is upholstery grade, which you can't necessarily ascertain from a photo alone.
Nice pillows but would not recommend as there is not enough stuffing, they are flat. At the price I don't think I should have to go out and purchase filling.
Love these pillows! It matches the Ottoman/bench I purchased. I 'fluffed' the pillows after receiving them and they looked even better!
Great style and very well made pillows.
Nice pillows. Smaller than I thought. I bit on the expensive side, but good quality material.
Look great and are great quality! My only wish is that would be a little more stuffed.... Still would def get again and recommend
Very nice cover on pillow.Colors are not faded. Looks like it is from ************. Only concern is that pillows inside covers are not very full. However they unzip so more fill can be added
The pilliows are very atractive although not very flexible. They will do the job.

These pillows have exceeded my expectations. They are very well made, the covers are removable and fit snugly, the design is subtle but interesting and they enhance the look of our milk-chocolate brown sofa. Well worth the price. I will check this brand again when I need new throw pillows.
description:
Create a focal point for your sofa or bed with this set of two
INSPIRE Q accent pillows. Featuring a modern geometric pattern in
neutral shades of beige, blue, gray and yellow, this pillow set
coordinates with a range of contemporary looks. The square shape
and generous dimensions help to create a welcoming feel for your
furniture.Set includes two decorative throw pillows with a modern
  geometric patternKnife edging gives each pillow's square shape added
  definitionSet features fabric covers and polyester fill for
  comfortSpot clean as neededEach pillow measures 18" [L] x 18" [W]StylePatternedMaterialPolyesterPatternGeometricSet IncludeTwo PillowsCare InstructionSpot CleanSeason or HolidayAll SeasonsPillow ShapeSquareColorBeige, Blue, Brown, GoldFill TypePolyesterGallery MatchYesGallery RoomCameron Court, Capriccio, Classic Camel, Desert Neutrals, Desert Neutrals II, Desert Neutrals Ii, Natural Perspective, Pinstripe Modern, Summer Study, The LibraryPillow TypeAccent
